channel.title: What does buy and sell mean in shops.cfg?
channel.description:
there is standing in shops.cfg //-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount
What does the sell mean, what shall I type under it? What does the buy mean, what shall I type under it?
In autospawn.cfg it is standing RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType, what does all that mean and what shall I type under it?
What does droptype mean in npcdrops.cfg, and what shall I type under it?

item.title: What does buy and sell mean in shops.cfg?
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

sell means nutthing jut type 5

Read full topic
